videoSnippet.title: "The Wildest Game"
videoSnippet.description:
Have a great day!

Perez, Francisco Jose - Durao, Joaquim
Eine wilde Partie Schach (Beverwijk) E70 1961
E70 King's Indian, accelerated Averbakh system

1.d4 Nf6 2.c4 g6 3.Nc3 Bg7 4.e4 d6 5.Bg5 c5 6.d5 h6 7.Bh4 Qa5 8.Qd2 g5 9.Bg3 Nh5 10.Bd3 Nd7 11.Nge2 Ne5 12.O-O Ng6 13.f4 Nxg3 14.hxg3 Bg4 15.e5 O-O-O 16.a3 h5 17.Rfb1 e6 18.b4 Qb6 19.Na4 Qa6 20.Nec3 dxe5 21.bxc5 exf4 22.c6 bxc6 23.c5 Qa5 24.Qb2 Bd4+ 25.Kf1 Kd7 26.Qb7+ Ke8 27.Qxc6+ Kf8 28.Rb5 Ne5 29.Qb7 h4 30.Rxa5 hxg3 31.Ke1 Be3 32.Bf1 Rh1 33.Qb5 f3 34.gxf3 g2 35.fxg4 g1=Q 36.Ra2 Qg3+ 37.Kd1 Qf3+ 38.Kc2 Rxf1 39.d6 Nc6 40.Kb2 Rf2+ 41.Ka1 Qh1+ 42.Nb1 Bd4+ 43.Nb2 Nb4 44.axb4 Qc1 45.Rxa7 Bxb2+ 46.Rxb2 Qxb2#

00:00 Hello Everyone!
00:55 Game Starts!
02:30 Completely New Game!
07:00 Pause the Video!
10:40 Pause the Video 2!
11:45 It was in this position!
12:55 Pause the Video 3!
14:45 Contributions!

The 2022 U.S. Championship is a 14-player round-robin featuring the strongest players in the USA, who compete for $262,000 in prize money as well as the coveted title of U.S. Champion. If two or more players tie for first place a playoff will be held.

Players receive 90 minutes for the first 40 moves followed by 30 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30-second increment from move one. Draw offers are not allowed before move 30. Official website: uschesschamps.com

judgment.name: Inaccuracy
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Kd1 was best.

analysis.variation: Nf3+ Kd1 Nd4 Ke1 Qg3+ Kd1 Qf3+ Ke1 Nxb5 Rf2 Qxf2+ Kd1 Rxf1#

judgment.name: Inaccuracy
judgment.comment: Lost forced checkmate sequence. Nf3+ was best.
